description: This cake, at its best when warm, is full of dark molasses flavor and three kinds of ginger (fresh, ground and crystallized) It can be served with powdered sugar, whipped cream or even ice cream — a drizzle of caramel sauce is especially nice, too.
title: Triple Ginger Skillet Cake
title_page: Triple Ginger Skillet Cake Recipe - NYT Cooking
text: This cake, at its best when warm, is full of dark molasses flavor and three kinds of ginger (fresh, ground and crystallized). It can be served with powdered sugar, whipped cream or even ice cream — a drizzle of caramel sauce is especially nice, too.
